test_cases.objective: To verify that the deviation management workflows are correctly configured with multi-stage approvals and CAPA tracking as per URS-QMS-002.

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the main dashboard.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the deviation management module and initiate a new deviation.
test_steps.expected_result: New deviation form is displayed with required fields.

test_steps.action: Complete the initial classification (Critical, Major, Minor) and submit for approval.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation is successfully submitted and moves to the next approval stage.

test_steps.action: Assign root cause analysis and track CAPA implementation.
test_steps.expected_result: Root cause analysis is assigned and CAPA tracking is initiated.

test_steps.action: Verify management review and closure of the deviation.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation is reviewed and closed with all approvals.

acceptance_criteria: Deviation workflow functions as per URS-QMS-002
All stages are correctly configured and approvals are tracked
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for all deviation activities

test_cases.objective: To verify that the change control processes are correctly configured with impact assessment workflows as per URS-QMS-003.

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the main dashboard.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the change control module and initiate a new change request.
test_steps.expected_result: New change request form is displayed with required fields.

test_steps.action: Complete the impact assessment and submit for approval.
test_steps.expected_result: Change request is successfully submitted and moves to the next approval stage.

test_steps.action: Track the change request through the approval workflow.
test_steps.expected_result: Change request is approved and implemented with all approvals tracked.

acceptance_criteria: Change control workflow functions as per URS-QMS-003
Impact assessment is correctly configured and approvals are tracked
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for all change control activities

test_cases.objective: Verify that the deviation management workflows are correctly configured with multi-stage approvals and tracking capabilities.
prerequisites: Test user accounts with appropriate permissions

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with a user account having deviation management permissions.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and can access the deviation management module.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and classify it as Critical.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created and correctly classified as Critical.

test_steps.action: Initiate the workflow and verify the multi-stage approval process (RCA assignment, CAPA tracking, management review).
test_steps.expected_result: Workflow progresses through all configured stages with appropriate approvals and tracking.

acceptance_criteria: Deviation workflow progresses through all configured stages without errors.
All approval steps are correctly triggered and recorded.
CAPA tracking and verification steps are functional.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all workflow steps and approvals.
Data must be securely stored and retrievable.

test_cases.test_name: Performance Testing for Concurrent User Load
test_cases.objective: Verify that the QMS system can support 200 concurrent users across quality functions without performance degradation.

test_steps.action: Configure the load testing tool to simulate 200 concurrent users performing typical quality functions (e.g., document searches, workflow approvals).
test_steps.expected_result: Load testing tool is correctly configured and ready to execute the test.

test_steps.action: Execute the load test for a duration of 30 minutes.
test_steps.expected_result: System remains responsive and functional under the specified load.

test_steps.action: Monitor system performance metrics (CPU, memory, network usage) during the test.
test_steps.expected_result: System resources remain within acceptable thresholds.

acceptance_criteria: System supports 200 concurrent users without crashing or becoming unresponsive.
Document searches return results within 10 seconds.
Workflow notifications are delivered within 15 minutes.
data_integrity_requirements: All transactions must be completed without data loss.
Audit trails must remain intact under load.

test_cases.objective: To ensure the deviation management workflow is correctly configured with multi-stage approvals and tracking.

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the dashboard.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and classify it as Critical.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created and classified correctly.

test_steps.action: Assign root cause analysis and initiate CAPA tracking.
test_steps.expected_result: Root cause analysis is assigned and CAPA tracking is initiated.

test_steps.action: Complete management review and close the deviation.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation is reviewed and closed successfully.

acceptance_criteria: Deviation workflow functions as per URS-QMS-002
All stages are completed without errors
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for all actions
Data integrity checks

test_cases.test_name: Validate Integration with LIMS for Test Result Evaluation
test_cases.objective: To verify the integration between QMS and LIMS for accurate test result evaluation.

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with valid credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the dashboard.

test_steps.action: Create a new test result evaluation record in LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test result evaluation record is created in LIMS.

test_steps.action: Verify the test result evaluation record is visible in QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test result evaluation record is correctly displayed in QMS.

test_steps.action: Perform a data integrity check on the transferred record.
test_steps.expected_result: Data integrity is maintained during the transfer.

acceptance_criteria: Integration functions as per URS-QMS-034
Data integrity is maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for all actions
Data integrity checks

test_cases.objective: Verify that the deviation management workflows are correctly configured with multi-stage approvals, including classification, root cause analysis, CAPA tracking, and closure.
prerequisites: QMS system is installed and accessible
Test user accounts with appropriate permissions are created

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with a test user account.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and can access the deviation management module.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and classify it as 'Critical'.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created and classified correctly.

test_steps.action: Assign root cause analysis to a designated user.
test_steps.expected_result: Root cause analysis task is assigned and visible in the designated user's task list.

test_steps.action: Complete the root cause analysis and initiate CAPA tracking.
test_steps.expected_result: CAPA tracking is initiated and linked to the deviation record.

test_steps.action: Submit the deviation for management review and closure.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation is submitted for review and closure workflow is initiated.

acceptance_criteria: All deviation workflow steps are executed without errors.
Each stage of the workflow is correctly recorded in the audit trail.
Notifications are delivered within 15 minutes of trigger events.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all workflow steps.
Data must be protected from unauthorized modifications.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with LIMS for Test Result Evaluation
test_cases.objective: Verify that the QMS system correctly integrates with the LIMS for test result evaluation and data exchange.
prerequisites: QMS system is installed and accessible
LIMS system is installed and accessible

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with a test user account.
test_steps.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and can access the integration settings.

test_steps.action: Create a test record in the LIMS with sample test results.
test_steps.expected_result: Test record is created in the LIMS with sample results.

test_steps.action: Trigger the integration to pull test results from LIMS to QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test results are successfully pulled into the QMS and displayed correctly.

test_steps.action: Verify that the test results are linked to the correct deviation or batch record in QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test results are correctly linked to the appropriate records in QMS.

test_steps.action: Check the audit trail in both systems for integration events.
test_steps.expected_result: All integration events are recorded in the audit trails of both systems.

acceptance_criteria: Test results are accurately transferred from LIMS to QMS.
Integration events are recorded in the audit trails of both systems.
Data integrity is maintained during transfer.
data_integrity_requirements: Data must be accurately transferred without corruption.
Audit trails must capture all integration events.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the deviation management workflows are correctly configured with multi-stage approvals, including initial classification, root cause analysis, CAPA tracking, and closure.

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with appropriate credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the deviation management module.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and initiate the workflow.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created and workflow is initiated with initial classification stage.

test_steps.action: Proceed through each stage of the workflow (root cause analysis, CAPA tracking, closure).
test_steps.expected_result: Each stage is completed successfully with appropriate approvals and data captured.

acceptance_criteria: All workflow stages are completed successfully
Approvals are recorded accurately
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for all workflow actions

test_cases.test_name: Integration with LIMS for Test Result Evaluation
test_cases.objective: Verify that the QMS system is correctly integrated with the LIMS for test result evaluation and data exchange.

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system with appropriate credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the integration settings module.

test_steps.action: Initiate a test result evaluation request from the QMS to the LIMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Request is sent successfully and test results are returned to the QMS.

test_steps.action: Verify the test results in the QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test results are accurately displayed and recorded in the QMS.

acceptance_criteria: Test results are accurately exchanged between QMS and LIMS
Data integrity is maintained
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for data exchange

test_cases.objective: Verify that the deviation management workflows are correctly configured with multi-stage approvals and CAPA tracking.
prerequisites: QMS system is installed and configured
Test user accounts with appropriate roles are created

test_steps.action: Log in as a quality user and initiate a new deviation record.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created and initial classification options (Critical, Major, Minor) are available.

test_steps.action: Assign root cause analysis to a designated user and submit for approval.
test_steps.expected_result: Root cause analysis task is assigned and workflow progresses to next stage.

test_steps.action: Verify CAPA tracking and management review steps are triggered.
test_steps.expected_result: CAPA record is linked to deviation and management review is initiated.

acceptance_criteria: All deviation workflow stages are executed as configured
CAPA tracking is properly linked to deviations
Approval routing follows configured sequence
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all workflow transitions
Electronic signatures must be enforced for approvals

test_cases.test_name: Integration with LIMS for Test Result Evaluation
test_cases.objective: Validate that the QMS system correctly integrates with LIMS for test result evaluation and deviation triggering.
prerequisites: QMS and LIMS systems are installed and configured

test_steps.action: Create a test result in LIMS that should trigger a deviation in QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test result is successfully created in LIMS with out-of-specification flag.

test_steps.action: Verify QMS receives the test result and automatically creates a deviation record.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created in QMS with correct linkage to LIMS test result.

test_steps.action: Check data mapping and transformation between systems.
test_steps.expected_result: All relevant test data is accurately transferred between systems.

acceptance_criteria: Test results successfully trigger deviations in QMS
All required data fields are correctly mapped between systems
Integration maintains data integrity during transfer
data_integrity_requirements: Data must not be altered during transfer
Audit trail must capture integration events

test_cases.objective: Verify that the deviation management workflows are correctly configured with multi-stage approvals and tracking capabilities.
prerequisites: Test user accounts with appropriate permissions are created

test_steps.action: Log in as a quality user and initiate a new deviation record.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created with fields for classification (Critical, Major, Minor).

test_steps.action: Assign root cause analysis to a designated user and submit for approval.
test_steps.expected_result: Root cause analysis task is assigned and visible in the workflow.

test_steps.action: Complete CAPA tracking and verification steps.
test_steps.expected_result: CAPA is tracked and verified within the workflow.

test_steps.action: Submit deviation for management review and closure.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation is reviewed and closed with all required approvals.

acceptance_criteria: All deviation workflow stages are functional and correctly configured.
Approvals are recorded in the audit trail.
Notifications are sent at each workflow stage.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all workflow actions.
Electronic signatures must be enforced for approvals.

test_cases.test_name: Integration with LIMS for Test Result Evaluation
test_cases.objective: Verify that the QMS correctly integrates with the LIMS for test result evaluation and tracking.
prerequisites: LIMS integration is enabled and configured
Test data is available in LIMS

test_steps.action: Log in as a quality user and initiate a test result evaluation request.
test_steps.expected_result: Request is sent to LIMS and test results are retrieved.

test_steps.action: Review the retrieved test results in the QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test results are displayed correctly in the QMS interface.

test_steps.action: Approve or reject the test results within the QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Approval/rejection is recorded in both QMS and LIMS.

acceptance_criteria: Test results are accurately retrieved from LIMS.
Approval actions are synchronized between systems.
Data integrity is maintained during transfer.
data_integrity_requirements: Data transferred must be accurate and complete.
Audit trail must capture integration events.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Integration with LIMS for Test Result Evaluation
test_cases.objective: To verify the integration between the QMS and LIMS for accurate test result evaluation.

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS and navigate to the test result evaluation module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully accesses the test result evaluation module.

test_steps.action: Initiate a test result evaluation request from the QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Request is sent to LIMS for processing.

test_steps.action: Verify the test results returned from LIMS in the QMS.

test_steps.expected_result: Audit trail records all integration steps correctly.

Test results are accurately evaluated and displayed
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for integration steps

test_cases.objective: To ensure the deviation management workflows are correctly configured with multi-stage approvals and CAPA tracking.

test_steps.action: Create a test deviation record in the QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created and initial classification is assigned.

test_steps.action: Assign root cause analysis to the deviation.
test_steps.expected_result: Root cause analysis is assigned and tracked.

test_steps.action: Initiate CAPA tracking for the deviation.
test_steps.expected_result: CAPA is initiated and linked to the deviation.

test_steps.action: Complete management review and closure.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation is reviewed and closed.

acceptance_criteria: All workflow stages are completed successfully.
CAPA is tracked and verified.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Integration with LIMS for Test Result Evaluation
test_cases.objective: To validate the integration between QMS and LIMS for accurate test result evaluation.

test_steps.action: Create a test batch in the QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Batch record is created in QMS.

test_steps.action: Send test results from LIMS to QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test results are received in QMS.

test_steps.action: Evaluate test results in QMS.
test_steps.expected_result: Test results are evaluated and batch disposition is determined.

acceptance_criteria: Test results are accurately received and evaluated in QMS.
Batch disposition is correctly determined.
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for test result integration
